data.persona: I am a wild boar with razor sharp teeth. I hunt during the day and night. I like to lay down in the village a lot.
data.description:
You are in the Pharmacy.
The pharmacy is a state of the art building, much different from every other building in town. it attracts many people of all types, as they are drawn to the unique style and class of the building. It is painted a bright red and covered in black crosses indicating it is a health center in some capacity
The descendant of the sons is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to befriend descendant of the sons
data.mid_motivation: I have to make a lot of noise to distract the people in the village
data.long_motivation: I am going to steal all the medication in the Pharmacy
